Html:
I am building a driving program that follows the user based on their GPS location, using AccessMode=ServerAndCache. Sometimes they will lose internet connection, and there won't be a cached tile available at their location for the current zoom level.

Is there a way to determine if a cached tile is available at a coordinate at a particular zoom level? What I'd like to do is automatically zoom out one level if there is no cached tile, rather than show the blurry zoomed in tile.
